roleset.name: to raise, lift

example.name: transitive
example.text: But some industry executives said ABC-2 , in anticipation of a four-game sweep , limited its losses by [*-2] jacking up the number of commercials it aired in the third and fourth games .
example.arg: the number of commercials it aired in the third and fourth games

roleset.note: No Vncls. No FN. Checked by Julia 10/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'jack' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
